entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
